original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1066)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4610)@</color> 秒內提升我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> 所有抗性。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1066)@</color> Within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4610)@</color> seconds Raise all resistances of all our generals <color=#ccffcc>25%</color>.
